DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Lanreotide Maintenance Therapy Patients With Non-Resectable Duodeno-Pancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumors ( REMINET )
DOC.detailed_description: This European , prospective , multicentre , double-blind randomise study evaluate lanreotide ( 120 mg every 28 day disease progression ) versus placebo patient metastatic/locally advanced , non-resectable , duodeno-pancreatic neuroendocrine tumour . Depending phase II result , study may continue phase III . The treatment follow-up patient phase II phase III . After first-line treatment , patient randomly assign 1:1 ratio receive either lanreotide placebo . The study treatment initiate within 6 week follow confirmation date stable disease objective response . Treatment period : For patient , investigational product ( lanreotide placebo ) provide accord double-blind procedure disease progression toxicity , accordance protocol . The estimated average treatment duration patient 12 month . Follow-up period : To evaluate overall survival , patient phase II minimum follow-up period 12 month ; study continue phase III , patient maximum follow-up period 10 year . Phase III patient minimum follow-up period 5 year .
